using namespace std;
 #define gc getchar_unlocked


void scanint(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}

#define N 1000001

int main()
{
    int i,n,t,x,y;
    scanint(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanint(x);
        scanint(y);
        if(x==y&&!(x&1))
        {
            cout<<(4)*(x/2)<<"\n";

        }
        else if(x==y&&(x&1))
        {
            cout<<1+(4*((x-1)/2))<<"\n";
        }

        else if(y==x-2&&!(x&1)&&!(y&1))
        {
            cout<<2+2*y<<"\n";
        }
        else if(y==x-2&&(x&1)&&(y&1))
        {

            cout<<3+4*((y-1)/2)<<"\n";
        }
        else
        cout<<"No Number\n";




    }

}
